接口的使用
org.springframework.web.cors.CorsConfigurationSource

  • 使用CorsConfigurationSource的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.cors
    Support for CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing), based on a common CorsProcessor strategy.
    org.springframework.web.filter
    Provides generic filter base classes allowing for bean-style configuration.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.handler
    Provides standard HandlerMapping implementations, including abstract base classes for custom implementations.
    org.springframework.web.servlet.resource
    Support classes for serving static resources.
    org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.support
    Support classes for SockJS including an AbstractSockJsService implementation.
    org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport
    Server-side support for SockJS transports including TransportHandler implementations for processing incoming requests, their session counterparts for sending messages over the various transports, and DefaultSockJsService.
    org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.handler
    TransportHandler implementation classes as well as a concrete SockJsService.

    • org.springframework.web.cors中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.cors中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource
      Provide a per request CorsConfiguration instance based on a collection of CorsConfiguration mapped on path patterns.

    • org.springframework.web.filter中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      参数类型为CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.filter中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CorsFilter(CorsConfigurationSource configSource)
      Constructor accepting a CorsConfigurationSource used by the filter to find the CorsConfiguration to use for each incoming request.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.handler中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.servlet.handler中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HandlerMappingIntrospector
      Helper class to get information from the HandlerMapping that would serve a specific request.
      参数类型为CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.servlet.handler中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AbstractHandlerMapping.setCorsConfigurationSource(CorsConfigurationSource corsConfigurationSource)
      Set the "global" CORS configuration source.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.resource中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.servlet.resource中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ResourceHttpRequestHandler
      HttpRequestHandler that serves static resources in an optimized way according to the guidelines of Page Speed, YSlow, etc.

    • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.support中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractSockJsService
      An abstract base class for SockJsService implementations that provides SockJS path resolution and handling of static SockJS requests (e.g.
      class  SockJsHttpRequestHandler
      An HttpRequestHandler that allows mapping a SockJsService to requests in a Servlet container.

    • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  TransportHandlingSockJsService
      A basic implementation of SockJsService with support for SPI-based transport handling and session management.

    • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.handler中CorsConfigurationSource的使用

      实现CorsConfigurationSource的org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.handler中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultSockJsService
      A default implementation of SockJsService with all default TransportHandler implementations pre-registered.
